title: HP Inc. Unveils a Broad Restructuring Plan, With Massive Layoffs and a Huge Buyback Program
text:
HP Inc. late Thursday unveiled a broad corporate restructuring plan that includes reducing its head count by as much as 16%, shifting its business model in printers, boosting its dividend, and expanding its stock-repurchase program. The company also provided better-than-expected profit guidance for the October 2020 fiscal year.

description: The company will cut staff by up to 16%, buy back up to 25% of its stock, and boost its dividend. It also provided better-than-expected profit guidance.
